|rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== * Web GUI: http://tplinkwifi.net The Multiple Listing document on the FCC says that the [[TP-LINK]] :'''Archer C7 v5''' and '''Archer A7 v5''' models are identical. {{See also|TP-LINK Archer A7 v5.x|TP-LINK}} ==Links of Interest== *[https://www.tp-link.com/us/support/alexa-compatibility/ ''Alexa Compatibility for TP-Link Wi-Fi products'' on '''TP-LINK'''] ===Reviews=== *[https://ru.gecid.com/netlan/tp-link_archer_c7_v5/ ''TP-LINK Archer C7 v5'' on '''Gecid'''] (RU) ([https://ru.gecid.com/data/netlan/201810120800-53818/img/10_1_tp-link_archer_c7_v5.jpg PCB images]) :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9563 WiSoC (802.11bgn) :Flash: [[Winbond]] W25Q128JVSQ (16MB SPI) :RAM: [[ESMT]] M14D1G1664A-2.5B (128MB DDR2) :WLAN: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9880-BR4A (802.11an/ac) :LAN: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8337N 1GbE (1x WAN, 4x LAN) ===Firmware=== *[https://dd-wrt.com/support/other-downloads/?path=betas%2F2018%2F12-12-2018-r37961%2Ftplink_archer-c7-v5%2F ''TP-LINK Archer C7 v5'' - FW (beta) '''DD-WRT'''] *[https://openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/archer-c7-1750 ''TP-LINK Archer C7 v5 AC1750'' - FW '''OpenWrt'''] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = archer-c7-v5 build 37837 20181123 :[https://forum.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/TP_Link_Archer_C7 Install Guide] Please insert instructions here ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/tp-link/tp-link_archer_c7_v5 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/archer_c7 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ar71xx-ath79 |subtarget = generic |arch = mips_24kc |support_started_version = 18.06.0 |current_supported_version = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== *Reset: GPIO 5 (C7 v5), GPIO 11 (A7 v5) *WPS: GPIO 2 :;Open-WRT 19.07.02 
mtd0 0x00000 size 0x20000 
mtd1 0x20000 size 0x20000
mtd2 0x40000 size 0x10000
mtd3 0x50000 size 0x10000
mtd4 0x60000 size 0x20000
mtd5 0x80000 size 0x40000
mtd6 0xc0000 size 0xc00000
mtd7 0xc0000 size 0x174000
mtd8 0x2341b0 size 0xd8be00
mtd9 0x6c0000 size 0x900000
mtd10 0xff0000 size 0x10000
